channel.title: Hands On Labs on Bengt's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hands On Labs on Bengt's Blog

item.title: Cloud Management Tech Zone
item.description: Dead or alive? Is the good old Pathfinder dead and Modern Apps and Cloud Management Techzone next? Maybe, or maybe it isn’t What am I talking about? For some time, VMware have had a collection of resources assembled as a collection in a one-stop-shop for resources such as videos, blogs, articles and training for all the cloud management products. Even the Hands-On Labs have had links on these pages. This collection was called PathFinder
